START_USE_CARD: Start using your card with these
CONFIGURE_CARD: CONFIGURE YOUR CARD WILL TAKE LESS THAN
INVALID_USERNAME: You can only use alphanumeric characters
NAME_ALREADY_TAKEN: The chosen name is already in use
INVALID_RECIPIENT: The entered recipient is not valid
LOSE_KEY: If I lose my private key, I will lose my funds.
SHARE_KEY: If I share my private key, my funds can be stolen.
DETAIL_FAILED_TRANSACTION: An error occurred while sending the transfer, and the funds have been reversed.
INVALID_NONCE: You need a valid activation code to create an account
ERROR_ON_CREATE_ACCOUNT: An error occurred while creating the account
ERROR_COPY: An error occurred while copying to the clipboard
INVALID_SENDABLE_AMOUNT: The destination wallet only allows sending between {{ minSendable }} and {{ maxSendable }} {{ currency }}
SENDABLE_AMOUNT: You can send between {{ minSendable }} and {{ maxSendable }} SATs
TRANSACTION_RECEIVED: You received a transfer of {{ sats }} sat
ERROR_ON_CREATE_INVOICE: An error occurred while generating the invoice
ERROR_INVOICE_AMOUNT: You must choose between {{ minAmount }} and {{ maxAmount }} {{ currency }}
INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE: You do not have enough balance to pay
KEY_LENGTH_ERROR: The private key must have a minimum of 32 digits
UNEXPECTED_RECEOVERY_ERROR: An error occurred while logging in
CONFIRM_LOGOUT: Are you sure you want to log out?
ERROR_MADE_BACKUP: You must backup your account before logging out
INVALID_EMAIL: The entered email is not valid
DETECT_NEW_CARD: A new card was detected. Press the button below if you want to associate it with your account.
ACTIVATE_SUCCESS: The card was activated and associated with your account
ACTIVATE_ERROR: An error occurred while activating the card
RECOMMEND_BACKUP_REASON: So you can log in whenever you need.
RECOMMEND_SAFARI_REASON: for better handling of the application.
VOUCHER_SUCCESS_DESC: You received a prize in your account...
VOUCHER_CARD_INFO: You can now use them with your card!
ONLY_BACKUP_MISSING: Now you just need to back up your account
RECEIVE_CODE_EMAIL: You received a code in your email
CLAIM_VOUCHER_DESC: Claim your SATs to enjoy Bitconf 23!
FAILED_REQUEST_VOUCHER: An error occurred while claiming the voucher
GO_TO_STAND: No problem! Come to our stand and we will help you load your wallet.
ERROR_ON_RESET_ACCOUNT: An error occurred while recovering the account
